short_summary: Replacement of two roofs at the embassy of Canada in Beijing.
description: This project includes removal and disposal of existing waterproofing membrane and roofing materials, repairs of damages and cracks in the roof deck and removal and reinstallation of electrical, mechanical and HVAC components as needed to ensure proper installation of waterproofing materials.
full_summary:
# Replacement of Roofs at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing

**Announcement Summary**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites you to submit a Request for Qualifications (RFQ) for the replacement of two roofs at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing. To be considered for this project, contractors must meet the prequalification requirements outlined in this document.

**Project Details**
The contract involves the replacement of two roofs at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing. This includes:

* Removal and disposal of existing waterproofing membrane and roofing materials
* Repairs to damage and cracks in the roof deck
* Removal and reinstallation of electrical, mechanical, and HVAC components as needed to ensure proper installation of waterproofing materials

**Contract Requirements**
To be eligible for this project, contractors must:

* Demonstrate the ability to provide a full range of services in English or French
* Have the capacity to travel to and perform work in Beijing, China
* Meet the prequalification requirements outlined in the RFQ document

** RFQ and Submission Process**
Interested contractors are required to respond to this RFQ document to be considered for this project. Only contractors deemed to meet the prequalification requirements will be invited to submit a competitive bid for this work during the Request for Proposal phase.

**Reference Information**
* Reference Number: PW-23-01027918
* Solicitation Number: 22-217335
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-14 14:00:00 EST
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Rainville, Eric
	+ Email: realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
	+ Phone: +1 343 572 7269

**Additional Resources**
* RFQ document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/34377906dd24770de65017e4524df04c/22-217335_-_beijing_-_replacement_of_roofs_-_rq.pdf
* Project Description document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/dcf293f4d0275eaf639801584c19ed06/22-217335_-_beijing_-_remplacement_de_toits_-_ddq.pdf

This announcement is available in both English and French. Please contact the contracting authority for further information. [end]
